help.employeeNo: System auto-generates unique employee numbers. Format can be changed from Settings > Numbering Rules.
help.workStatus: Select the legal work status of the employee in Russia. This determines which documents are required.
help.workStatusLocal: For Russian citizens or those who don't need a work permit. Standard employment documents apply.
help.workStatusPatent: For foreign nationals working with a patent. Monthly patent payments must be tracked. Patent expiry alerts will be activated.
help.workStatusVisa: For employees with a work visa. Visa type, validity dates, and entry type must be entered. Visa expiry alerts will be activated.
help.workStatusWorkPermit: For employees with an official work permit. Permit details and validity must be tracked.
help.workStatusResidence: For employees with a temporary or permanent residence permit. Permit details must be entered.
help.migrationCard: Migration card is issued at the Russian border to foreign nationals. Track the card number and validity dates.
help.registration: Registration at the place of stay is required for foreign nationals in Russia. Track the address and validity dates.
help.patent: A patent allows certain foreign nationals to work in Russia. Monthly fixed payments are required to keep it valid.
help.patentPayment: Patent holders must make monthly advance tax payments (NDFL) to keep their patent valid. Track each month's payment here.
help.visa: Visa details including type (work, business, etc.), number, and validity dates. Single or multi-entry type must be specified.
help.invitation: For visa applications, an invitation/authorization letter from the employer or migration authority may be required.
help.workPermit: Official work permit issued by the migration authority. Track permit number, issuing authority, region, and validity.
help.residencePermit: Temporary or permanent residence permit in Russia. Track permit number, type, and validity dates.
help.snils: SNILS (СНИЛС) - Russian individual insurance account number. Required for employment in Russia.
help.inn: INN (ИНН) - Russian taxpayer identification number. Required for tax purposes.
help.passport: International passport details. Track number, issuing authority, and validity dates. Upload passport copies in the Documents tab.
help.salary: Enter the NET salary amount. The system will automatically calculate the GROSS amount based on tax rules defined in Settings > Payroll Rules.
help.salaryNetToGross: When you enter NET salary, the system calculates GROSS by adding NDFL tax. Formula: Gross = Net / (1 - NDFL Rate). Rates are managed in Settings.
help.ndflRate: NDFL (НДФЛ) rate. Default: 13% for tax residents, 30% for non-residents. Can be overridden per employee. Rates managed in Settings > Payroll Rules.
help.taxStatus: Tax residency status affects the NDFL rate. Residents: 13%, Non-residents: 30%. Rates can be changed in Settings.
help.paymentType: How the employee is compensated: Monthly fixed salary, Hourly rate, Daily rate, or Piece-rate (hakediş/progress-based).
help.overtimeMultiplier: Overtime hours are multiplied by this factor. Default: 1.5x. Can be changed per employee.
help.nightMultiplier: Night shift hours (typically 22:00-06:00) are multiplied by this factor. Default: 1.2x.
help.holidayMultiplier: Hours worked on official holidays are multiplied by this factor. Default: 2.0x.
help.attendance: Daily attendance/timesheet records. Enter check-in/check-out times, total hours, overtime, and night hours. Can be entered in bulk per worksite.
help.attendancePeriod: Attendance is organized by monthly periods per worksite. Submit for review, then approve to lock the period.
help.hakkedis: Progress-based payment tracking for construction work. Define work items with units (m², m³, etc.), quantities, and unit prices. Can be distributed among team members.
help.asset: Company property assigned to employees. Track tools, PPE, devices, keys, etc. Record assignment, return, damage, and loss events.
help.assetDeposit: Optional deposit amount for valuable items. Can be deducted from salary if the item is lost or damaged.
help.document: Employee documents with expiry tracking. Upload files, set expiry dates, and get automatic alerts before documents expire.
help.documentRequired: Required documents are determined by the employee's work status. Admin can configure rules in Settings > Document Requirements.
help.documentVerification: Documents can be verified by authorized users. Verified status, verifier name, and date are recorded.
help.leave: Leave management with balance tracking. Different leave types (annual, sick, unpaid, etc.) with configurable entitlements.
help.transfer: Track employee transfers between worksites. Record transfer type (temporary/permanent), reason, and effects on accommodation and salary.
help.alert: Automatic alerts for expiring documents, patents, visas, registrations, contracts, and probation periods. Alert rules are configured in Settings.
help.alertDays: Warning and critical alert thresholds (days before expiry). Customizable per alert rule in Settings > Alert Rules.
help.payroll: Monthly payroll processing per worksite. Calculates based on attendance, salary profile, earnings, and deductions. Supports manual adjustments.
help.payrollRun: Payroll runs go through stages: Draft → Calculated → Approved → Paid → Locked. Only approved runs can be paid.
help.customFields: Admin-defined custom fields for additional data. Configure in Settings > Custom Fields. Fields can be text, number, date, select, or boolean.
help.numberingRules: Auto-numbering format for employees, assets, and documents. Example: SAELA-EMP-000001. Configure prefix and padding in Settings.
help.roles: User roles define access permissions. System roles (Super Admin, Admin, etc.) cannot be deleted. Custom roles can be created.
help.siteScoped: When enabled, users with this role can only see data from their assigned worksites.
help.worksite: Construction site/project information. Track location, dates, managers, and client details.
help.department: Organizational departments. Can be hierarchical (parent-child). All employees belong to a department.
help.shift: Work shift definitions with start/end times and break duration. Night shifts are automatically flagged for night multiplier calculation.
help.importExcel: Import data from Excel files. Download the template, fill in your data, then upload. The system validates data before importing and shows errors per row.
help.backup: Database backup and restore. Regular backups are recommended. Files stored in Google Cloud Storage.
help.auditLog: Complete history of all changes in the system. Records who changed what, when, and the before/after values.
